europeana:record.dc:title: A replacement name for Sphenomorphus keiensis (Kopstein, 1926) from the southeastern Moluccas, Indonesia (Reptilia: Squamata: Scincidae) with a redescription of the species
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Shea G.M.
Michels J.P.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Amphibia, Reptilia
Scincidae
Sphenomorphus
systematics
nomenclature
Indonesia
europeana:record.dc:description: Lygosoma keiensis Kopstein, 1926 is demonstrated to be a junior primary homonym of Lygosoma cyanogaster keiensis Sternfeld, 1918. The junior homonym, now placed in Sphenomorphus, is given the replacement name S. capitolythos, and redescribed from the holotype, the only known specimen.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A replacement name for Sphenomorphus keiensis (Kopstein, 1926) from the southeastern Moluccas, Indonesia (Reptilia: Squamata: Scincidae) with a redescription of the species (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 82) (Issue 52)
